title: Explore Beads workflow system
description:
Learn how to use Beads effectively for AI-assisted development workflows. Key goals:
- Understand the CLI-first approach
- Learn issue creation and tracking patterns
- Explore dependency management
- Practice session management
- Document best practices for LLM context retention

Related docs: .beads/README.md

title: Implement Phase 14 features using Beads
description: Develop new features using Beads workflow best practices learned from exploration.\nThis issue depends on completing the initial exploration to ensure proper workflow adoption.
close_reason: Exploration complete, ready to implement features
